reviews.review_msg: Balemba's test are hard. Even coming to class I didn't pass the midterm basically the whole class failed the midterm and she would not curve it. I will never take this professor again.

Dr. Balemba is a cool person and she can be pretty funny, but her class is HARD. She pretty much just summarizes the reading in her lecture, and her tests are awful. 7 chapters per test at least, and two tests per semester. Each worth 30% of your grade.
